channel.title: NDTV News Search Records Found 1000
channel.description: NDTV.com provides the latest information from and in-depth coverage of India and the world. Find breaking news, India news, top stories, elections, politics, business, cricket, movies, lifestyle, health, live TV, videos, photos and more.

item.title: Trump Picks Daughter-In-Law Lara Trump For North Carolina Senate Seat

media:content.media:description: Lara Trump, who is married to Donald Trump's son Eric, is a native of North Carolina.

item.description: Donald Trump on Tuesday floated his daughter-in-law Lara Trump as a possible replacement for U.S. Senator Thom Tillis, who will not seek reelection in North Carolina after clashing with the U.S. president over his tax-cut and spending bill.
item.content:encoded: Donald Trump on Tuesday floated his daughter-in-law Lara Trump as a possible replacement for U.S. Senator Thom Tillis, who will not seek reelection in North Carolina after clashing with the U.S. president over his tax-cut and spending bill.

item.title: Zohran Mamdani Confirmed As Democratic Candidate For New York Mayor

media:content.media:description: Zohran Mamdani would be the first Muslim mayor of New York City if he wins the November election.

item.description: Rising star of the American left Zohran Mamdani is now officially the Democratic candidate for mayor of New York City, according to official results released Tuesday.
item.content:encoded: Rising star of the American left Zohran Mamdani is now officially the Democratic candidate for mayor of New York City, according to official results released Tuesday.

item.title: Quad Leaders Condemn Pahalgam Terror Attack, Seek Justice

media:content.media:description: S Jaishankar addresses media at Quad Foreign Ministers' meeting in Washington on Tuesday.

item.description: A joint statement by the foreign ministers of the U.S., India, Japan and Australia condemned an April 22 militant attack in Jammu and Kashmir's Pahalgam that killed 26 people, and urged that those behind it be brought to justice.
item.content:encoded: A joint statement by the foreign ministers of the U.S., India, Japan and Australia condemned an April 22 militant attack in Jammu and Kashmir's Pahalgam that killed 26 people, and urged that those behind it be brought to justice.

item.title: "India Has Right To Defend Against Terrorism": S Jaishankar At Quad Meet

media:content.media:description: S Jaishankar attended the Quad Foreign Ministers' Meeting in Washington.

item.description: India's External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar, US Secretary of State Marco Rubio, Japan's Minister of Foreign Affairs Takeshi Iwaya, and Australia's Penny Wong attended the Quad Foreign Ministers' Meeting at the US Department of State on Tuesday.
item.content:encoded: India's External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar, US Secretary of State Marco Rubio, Japan's Minister of Foreign Affairs Takeshi Iwaya, and Australia's Penny Wong attended the Quad Foreign Ministers' Meeting at the US Department of State on Tuesday.

item.title: Israel Has Agreed To Conditions To Finalise 60-Day Gaza Ceasefire: Trump

media:content.media:description: Trump also urged Hamas to accept the 60-day Gaza ceasefire deal.

item.description: President Donald Trump said on Tuesday Israel had agreed "to the necessary conditions to finalize" a 60-day ceasefire in Gaza during which efforts will be made to end the U.S. ally's war in the Palestinian enclave.
item.content:encoded: President Donald Trump said on Tuesday Israel had agreed "to the necessary conditions to finalize" a 60-day ceasefire in Gaza during which efforts will be made to end the U.S. ally's war in the Palestinian enclave.

item.title: NASA's Anil Menon To Embark On His First International Space Station

media:content.media:description: Anil Menon, who born to Indian-Ukrainian parents, was graduated with the 23rd astronaut class in 2024.

item.description: NASA astronaut Anil Menon has been assigned his first mission to the International Space Station, serving as a flight engineer and Expedition 75 crew member, NASA said in its official statement.
item.content:encoded: NASA astronaut Anil Menon has been assigned his first mission to the International Space Station, serving as a flight engineer and Expedition 75 crew member, NASA said in its official statement.

item.title: Israel Army Says Intercepted Missile Launched From Yemen

media:content.media:description: Israel's military said it intercepted a missile launched from Yemen on Tuesday. (Representational)

item.description: Israel's military said it intercepted a missile launched from Yemen on Tuesday, while the Huthis claimed to have also attacked Israel with drones.
item.content:encoded: Israel's military said it intercepted a missile launched from Yemen on Tuesday, while the Huthis claimed to have also attacked Israel with drones.

item.title: "Will Strengthen Indo-Pacific Stability": S Jaishankar At Quad Summit

media:content.media:description: S Jaishankar met Marco Rubio, Australian Foreign Ministers Penny Wong and Takeshi Iwaya of Japan.

item.description: External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar said that the Quad ministerial meeting on Tuesday was very productive and will strengthen stability in the Indo-Pacific region.
item.content:encoded: External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar said that the Quad ministerial meeting on Tuesday was very productive and will strengthen stability in the Indo-Pacific region.

item.title: Multiple Shots Fired At ISKCON Temple In US, India Urges Swift Action

media:content.media:description: According to ISKCON, 20 to 30 bullets were fired at the temple building.

item.description: The ISKCON Sri Sri Radha Krishna Temple in Spanish Fork, Utah, renowned globally for hosting the annual Holi Festival, has come under attack in a suspected hate crime, with over two dozen bullets fired at the premises over several days.
item.content:encoded: The ISKCON Sri Sri Radha Krishna Temple in Spanish Fork, Utah, renowned globally for hosting the annual Holi Festival, has come under attack in a suspected hate crime, with over two dozen bullets fired at the premises over several days.

item.title: Two Chinese Nationals Arrested In US For Espionage

media:content.media:description: Two Chinese nationals have been arrested for espionage in the United States

item.description: Two Chinese nationals have been arrested for espionage and for allegedly seeking to recruit members of the US Navy to serve as intelligence assets, the Justice Department said Tuesday.
item.content:encoded: Two Chinese nationals have been arrested for espionage and for allegedly seeking to recruit members of the US Navy to serve as intelligence assets, the Justice Department said Tuesday.

item.title: Zohran Mamdani Officially Secures Nomination For New York City Mayor

media:content.media:description: The NYC Election board confirmed a stunning victory by Zohran Mamdani in the Democratic primary

item.description: The New York City Election board on Tuesday confirmed a stunning victory by mayoral candidate Zohran Mamdani in the Democratic primary, clearing the way for the political upstart to be the party's nominee for the November mayoral election.
item.content:encoded: The New York City Election board on Tuesday confirmed a stunning victory by mayoral candidate Zohran Mamdani in the Democratic primary, clearing the way for the political upstart to be the party's nominee for the November mayoral election.

item.title: X, India Spar Over Lawyer's 'Tom, Dick, And Harry' Remark For Government Officials

media:content.media:description: X has long been at loggerheads with PM Narendra Modi's government over content removal requests

item.description: A lawyer for Elon Musk's X told an Indian court that every "Tom, Dick, and Harry" government official had been authorised to issue content takedown orders, drawing a sharp rebuke from New Delhi's counsel in the latest clash over content moderation.
item.content:encoded: A lawyer for Elon Musk's X told an Indian court that every "Tom, Dick, and Harry" government official had been authorised to issue content takedown orders, drawing a sharp rebuke from New Delhi's counsel in the latest clash over content moderation.

item.title: After F Bomb On Live TV, Donald Trump Calls Joe Biden Son Of A B***h

media:content.media:description: While touring the newest migrant detention centre, Trump alleged that Biden wanted to put him there

item.description: While touring the newest migrant detention centre in "Alligator Alcatraz" on Tuesday afternoon with members of his cabinet, US president Donald Trump alleged that former president Joe Biden wanted to put him there.
item.content:encoded: While touring the newest migrant detention centre in "Alligator Alcatraz" on Tuesday afternoon with members of his cabinet, US president Donald Trump alleged that former president Joe Biden wanted to put him there.

item.title: "Don't Trust That Much": OpenAI CEO Sam Altman Admits ChatGPT Can Be Wrong

media:content.media:description: Don't place unwavering trust in ChatGPT, OpenAI CEO Sam Altman has warned

item.description: Don't place unwavering trust in ChatGPT, OpenAI CEO Sam Altman has warned. Speaking on the company's newly launched official podcast, Altman cautioned users against over-relying on the AI tool.
item.content:encoded: Don't place unwavering trust in ChatGPT, OpenAI CEO Sam Altman has warned. Speaking on the company's newly launched official podcast, Altman cautioned users against over-relying on the AI tool.

item.title: Dalai Lama To Meet Senior Buddhist Monks Before Reincarnation Statement

media:content.media:description: Tibetan Buddhists believe that enlightened monks are reborn to continue their spiritual legacy

item.description: The Dalai Lama will meet 11 senior Buddhist monks on Wednesday morning before delivering a written statement that will "most probably" talk about his eventual succession as the spiritual head of Tibetan Buddhists, an official said.
item.content:encoded: The Dalai Lama will meet 11 senior Buddhist monks on Wednesday morning before delivering a written statement that will "most probably" talk about his eventual succession as the spiritual head of Tibetan Buddhists, an official said.

item.title: Putin To Macron: Iran Has 'Right' To Develop 'Peaceful' Nuclear Programme

media:content.media:description: Vladimir Putin told Emmanuel Macron that Iran has a "right" to develop a peaceful nuclear programme

item.description: Russian President Vladimir Putin told his French counterpart Emmanuel Macron in a phone call Tuesday that Moscow's ally Iran has a "right" to develop a peaceful nuclear programme, the Kremlin said.
item.content:encoded: Russian President Vladimir Putin told his French counterpart Emmanuel Macron in a phone call Tuesday that Moscow's ally Iran has a "right" to develop a peaceful nuclear programme, the Kremlin said.

item.title: Macron Urges Ukraine Ceasefire In Talks With Putin: Elysee

media:content.media:description: Emmanuel Macron urged Vladimir Putin to agree to a ceasefire in Ukraine

item.description: French President Emmanuel Macron urged Russian leader Vladimir Putin on Tuesday to agree to a ceasefire in Ukraine "as soon as possible" as the two held their first known phone talks since 2022, the Elysee said.
item.content:encoded: French President Emmanuel Macron urged Russian leader Vladimir Putin on Tuesday to agree to a ceasefire in Ukraine "as soon as possible" as the two held their first known phone talks since 2022, the Elysee said.

item.title: India Hosts "Jaipur Foot" Camp in Kabul, Gives Prosthetic Limbs To Afghan Amputees
item.description: India has been providing significant humanitarian aid to Afghanistan, demonstrating its commitment to supporting the country.
item.content:encoded: India has been providing significant humanitarian aid to Afghanistan, demonstrating its commitment to supporting the country.

item.title: Trump Says "Will Have A Lot Of Fun" With "Nut Job" Mamdani If He Is Elected

media:content.media:description: Donald Trump said that he will "have a lot of fun" with Zohran Mamdani if he is elected

item.description: US President Donald Trump said that the New York City Democratic nominee for mayor is a "pure, true communist" and a "total nut job" and added that he will "have a lot of fun with him" if he is elected.
item.content:encoded: US President Donald Trump said that the New York City Democratic nominee for mayor is a "pure, true communist" and a "total nut job" and added that he will "have a lot of fun with him" if he is elected.

item.title: US Senate Approves Trump's Divisive "One Big Beautiful Bill"

media:content.media:description: The Republican-led US Senate approved Donald Trump's flagship spending bill

item.description: The Republican-led US Senate approved Donald Trump's flagship spending bill Tuesday after a marathon voting session on the deeply unpopular package, set to slash social welfare programs and add an eye-watering $3 trillion to the national debt.
item.content:encoded: The Republican-led US Senate approved Donald Trump's flagship spending bill Tuesday after a marathon voting session on the deeply unpopular package, set to slash social welfare programs and add an eye-watering $3 trillion to the national debt.
